Info.Title: Kikaider: The Ultimate Human Robot
Info.Actors: Jingi Irie, Kazushige Nagashima, Aimi Satsukawa, Yûto Ikeda
Info.Plot: Komyoji Nobuhiko is a genius and leader in robotics who is running the so-called ARK project. He is the father and creator for the embodied artificial intelligence Kikaider. However, he ...
